summary: A collection of low‑level audio signal processing utilities for speech and multi‑channel audio, offering functions for magnitude/decibel conversion, RMS calculation, convolution matrix construction, signal‑to‑distortion ratio estimation, coherence analysis, synthetic noise field generation, channel selection, and related mathematical helpers.
business_intent: Enable ASR and speech‑processing pipelines to perform acoustic simulations, multi‑mic beamforming, speech enhancement, and evaluation of audio quality metrics.
